MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH35 area of Tranent, affecting properties in Cockburn Drive and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:30pm due to water ingress onto our equipment at 4 Cockburn Drive and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:37pm on Sunday, 14 February 2021
